data.question: Who are the authors of the study on the synthesis, structure, and reactivity of a cyapho-cyanamide salt?
data.answer: Doruk ErgçÅmen and Jose M. Goicoechea

data.question: What is the starting material for the synthesis of the cyapho-cyanamide salt [Na(18-crown-6)][N(CN)(CP)]?
What byproduct is eliminated during the synthesis of the cyapho-cyanamide salt?
Is the cyapho-cyanamide ion [N(CN)(CP)](cid:2) planar due to conjugation throughout the PCNCN backbone?
What was used to neutralize the resulting alcohol in the bulk scale synthesis of [Na(18-crown-6)][N(CN)(CP)]?
What is the significance of the dicyanophosphide ion ([P(CN)2](cid:2)) in the study?
data.answer: It was the first synthesised analogue of the dicyanamide ion with a heavier group 15 element replacing one of the nitrogen atoms.

data.question: Was the synthesis of the dicyanophosphide ion ([P(CN)2](cid:2)) reported as high yielding and atom efficient?
What reaction conditions favored the formation of the intermediate [HP{C(OMe)N(CN)}](cid:2) (1)?
Is the cyapho-cyanamide ion reactive towards electrophiles due to the extensive delocalisation of negative charge?
What was the outcome of the reaction of [Na(18-crown-6)][2] with Ph3GeCl?
data.answer: It gave rise to a new product and unreacted Ph3GeCl.

data.question: What does the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) for ion 2 reveal?
data.answer: Significant phosphorus atom pp orbital character.

data.question: Was the parent acid of the cyapho-cyanamide ion successfully isolated?
What does the formation of the cyapho-cyanamide ion demonstrate regarding ionic phosphacyanides?
data.answer: That by using an electron withdrawing cyanide group, the PCN moiety can be stabilized.

data.question: Did the study confirm the possibility of functionalization at the phosphorus atom of the cyapho-cyanamide ion?
What was the role of Li(HMDS) in the synthesis process?
data.answer: To neutralize the alcohol in the reaction mixture.

data.question: Is the cyapho-cyanamide ion stable in the presence of water?
What was the initial reactant combined with dimethyl N-cyanocarbonimidate to synthesize the cyapho-cyanamide ion?
What does the presence of three compounds in the in situ 31P NMR spectroscopy indicate during the synthesis?
data.answer: The formation of two isomers of N-cyano(carboximidate)phosphide and the target anion [N(CN)(CP)](cid:2).

data.question: Was the cyapho-cyanamide ion found to be unreactive towards electrophiles?
What does the study's exploration of the cyapho-cyanamide ion's synthesis contribute to the field of chemistry?
data.answer: It addresses the question of whether ionic phosphacyanides were isolable and demonstrates the stabilization of the PCN moiety.
